MarketplaceShortDescription: Platts agriculture price assessments provide a basis for trade across commodities and the world. But in this increasingly integrated and globalized environment, understanding the correlation between regions and sectors in order to compete effectively has never been more important.
MktPlaceDataSetEnhancementDesc: Trucost data containing global carbon metrics released on Xpressfeed. Coverage includes over 15,000+ public company records, 175+ environmental data points including carbon, water, waste, pollution, energy mix, many dating back to 2005.
MarketplaceLongDescription:
Platts agriculture price assessments provide a basis for trade across commodities and the world. But in this increasingly integrated and globalized environment, understanding the correlation between regions and sectors in order to compete effectively has never been more important.

Platts Market Data - Agriculture provides access to the full breadth and depth of our agriculture market data, including benchmarks and contract price assessments, plus:

  • A more connected view of the influences on the price of sugar, grains, oilseeds, vegetable oils, animal feed & protein and biofuels through access to the industry’s only integrated data sets across commodities, regions and verticals
  • Historical data to enable you to look at past market trends to inform your future plans and back testing needs
  • Combining this with the power of Platts standardized benchmark data will drive consistency and reduce basis risk throughout your organization - from strategy, trading and planning, to treasury and asset optimization
  • A robust and transparent methodology that brings consistency to our biofuels, sugar, grains, oilseeds and vegoils price assessments through principles and parameters that guide our market specialists at every stage of the process

Coverage Includes: 

North America

  • Ethanol Chicago 
  • Ethanol NYH Barge
  • Ethanol T2 FOB Rotterdam
  • US Soybeans
  • US Corn
  • US DDGS

EMEA

  • EU Biodiesel
  • EU Ethanol
  • European ETBE and RINs
  • Black Sea Wheat and Corn
  • Black Sea Sunflower Oil
  • European Palm Oil and Distillates
  • European Sugar

APAC

  • Asian ethanol
  • Australian Wheat
  • South Korean Corn
  • SOYBEX CFR China
  • Asian Palm Oil and Distillates
  • Asian Sugar

LATAM

  • NNE Brazil Ethanol
  • Brazilian and Argentinian Corn
  • Brazilian and Argentinian Soybeans
  • Argentinian Soybean Oil and Meal
  • Brazilian Sugar
MarketplaceDataProviderDesc: S&P Global Platts is the leading independent provider of information, benchmark prices and analytics for the energy and commodities markets. For over 100 years, we've brought clarity and transparency to the energy and commodities markets, enabling companies, governments and individuals to act with conviction.
PointInTimeDescription: Offers the timestamp of when a specific price is assessed or corrected

A Platts 7-character unique identifier that corresponds to a Market Data price value

Three letter code representing the currency of the commodity referenced
Code identifying the unit of measure for the numerical data Common Conversion Factor Common conversion factor to convert the data into alternative units

Code identifying the common conversion target unit of measure

Code identifying the unit of measurement corresponding to the contract size
